VIOLENCE

Kind of similar to It's Over. Once again, this track served me as a reference for making It's Over. I liked this one a lot even though I wasn't experience with sound design and mixing (seriously, the mix of this track was muddy). However, I learned a lot about music composition and sound engineering here, and some people liked it too.
